tests/test.sh shebang
ci/build_release shebang
ci/parse-changelog.sh shebang
ci/publish_to_galaxy shebang
ci/test.sh shebang
secrets.yml yamllint:unparsable-with-libyaml           # File loaded by Conjur server, not via Python
